overview: Elexis Monroe is heartbroken by her breakup with Alicia Silver. With Alicia now 8 months pregnant, Elexis seeks comfort in the arms of her ex-lover, Samantha Ryan. Meanwhile, Alicia tries masturbation as a way to alleviate pregnancy cramps per her doctorâ€™s orders. Unable to achieve orgasm, Alicia sweet-talks Elexis to come over and help her despite their separation.
tagline: Diaries of a Real Life Lesbian
title: Elexis and Her Girlfriends 2
